DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the long-term results after transcatheter mitral valve repair
DOC.brief_title: Coronary and Structural Interventions Ulm - Transcatheter Mitral Valve Repair (CSI-Ulm-TMVR)
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with transcatheter mitral valve repair are followed for 10 years to demonstrate efficacy and safety.
DOC.criteria: mitral valve regurgitation transcatheter mitral valve repair no written informed consent
